nodes.text: Bonagal was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories' Mandalore sector. Located within the Mandalore system, Bonagal occupied the seventh orbit around the system's star, Mandalore, between the orbits of Mandallia and Shukut. A gas giant, Bonagal was surrounded by thirty-four moons.

After the Taung forces of Mandalore the First journeyed from Roon to conquer the uninhabited planet that became Mandalore, the newly renamed Mandalorians spread out to conquer the worlds of the surrounding system, including Bonagal.
Bonagal was first introduced into Star Wars canon in the 2009 reference book, The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
